Marybeth Kram

Marybeth is an improv and comedy performer and writer in Chicago.

Email marybethkram at gmail dot com for specifics on upcoming shows!

Clued In

Improvised murder-mystery, in the style of Agatha Christie. Saturdays @7:30 (Jan 26 & 27, 2024)
Buy tickets at Second City

Hitch*Cocktails

Improvised thriller and drinking game, in the style of Alfred Hitchcock. Fridays @10 (Jan 12, 2024)
Buy tickets at The Annoyance

Interference: Dead Air

A supernatural thriller video game, with voice performance by Marybeth.
Available on Steam.

Fright
